entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 24 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 24 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 25 February 2023
